contentList.content: Sneak Attack
Second-Story Work
Searing Smite
Once per turn, you deal extra [1] when you attack with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> or target someone with one of your allies nearby.
You can use the Bonus Action granted by your Cunning Action to use Help.
You've mastered the art of falling and gain resistance to Falling damage. Also, you now use your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> to increase your Jumping distance.
Your weapon flares with white-hot intensity. It deals an extra [1] and marks the target with Searing Smite.
Jump (Thief)
Produce Flame: Hurl (Free)

Jump to a destination.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> affects how far you can jump.
End Short Rest
DnD Actions
Dodge
Cunning Action
Cunning Action: Hide
Wild Shape: Wolf
Wild Shape: Dire Wolf
Spend 1 Hit Dice to regain [1].
Ends the <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> for you and your party members around you.
A selection of common actions players can take.

Until the start of your next turn, any <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against you has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>, and you make Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. You lose this benefit if you are incapacitated or if your speed drops to 0.
You can use your Bonus Action to Dash, Disengage or Hide.
Take the shape of a brown bear with high HP.
Take the shape of a wolf that can use its allies for advantageous attacks and leave its enemies vulnerable.
Take the shape of a dire wolf that can use its allies for advantageous attacks and leave its enemies vulnerable.
Bolster yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life to gain [1] temporary hit points until you take a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.

Hit Dice (4)
Hit Dice (All)
Short Rest
Dodge
Searing Smite
Distracted
You haven't spent any Hit Dice. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent 1 Hit Die. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent 2 Hit Dice. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent 3 Hit Dice. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent 4 Hit Dice. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent all of your Hit Dice ([1])
Taking a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.

<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against you has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>, and you make Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>
Gained <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>. Lasts until <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Your weapon flares with white-hot intensity. Your next attack deals an extra [1] and marks the target with Searing Smite.
The next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> not from the Distracted Source is made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

You are Unconscious and must make Death Saving Throws. On 3 successes, you stop bleeding out and become Stable. On 3 failures, you die.
If you regain any Hit Points, lose Downed. If an ally Helps you and succeeds on their <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag>, you become stabilised and regain 1 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Point</LSTag> when Out of Combat.

Can't move or act. Attacks against a Prone creature have Advantage if they're made within [1] of the creature, otherwise they have Disadvantage.

A Prone creature must spend half its Movement Speed to stand up.
Wild Shape: Brown Bear
Wild Shape: Wolf
Shove (Prone)
Distract
Distract (Cunning Action)
Help (Cunning Action)
Shove a target to knock it prone. Shoving unsuspecting targets always succeeds.

Feint, distract the target, or in some other way team up to make your ally's next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> before your next turn have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Conjure ten magical berries for yourself or a companion. Creatures who eat a berry regain [1].
Burrow into the ground and emerge at the target position.

Help an ally in need.
Makes a <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag> to stabilise a <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag> character. Removes Burning, Ensnared, Entangled, Enwebbed, Prone, and Sleeping.
Sneak Attack
Allows the usage of the Sneak Attack Passive
You can use the Bonus Action granted by your Cunning Action to use Help.
You've mastered the art of falling and gain resistance to Falling damage. Also, you now use your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> to increase your Jumping distance.
